description: Prof. Samit Chaturvedi is a senior urologist who has given service to the fields of urology, robotic surgery, uro-oncology, and kidney transplants for more than 12 years of his professional life. Presently, he is the Director of Urology at Max Healthcare, contributing significantly to both clinical and academic fields. His commitment to patient care, along with expertise in advanced surgical techniques, has established him as a leader in the field of urology.
